en.title: Welcome to my page!ğŸ‘‹
en.description: Here you will find information about me, my experience, and skills. ğŸš€
en.aboutText: Experienced DevOps Engineer with 9+ years in IT, including ~4 years in DevOps and Site Reliability roles. Hands-on in building and maintaining cloud-native environments (Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, OpenShift) with a strong focus on automation (Terraform, Helm, GitOps with ArgoCD) and CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, Jenkins). Proven track record in deploying and operating containerized applications, optimizing reliability, and improving delivery speed. Skilled in monitoring and observability (Grafana, ELK) and troubleshooting complex distributed systems. Strong problem-solving mindset, combining platform engineering practices with application-level expertise.
en.certE13: E.13. Designing of local computer networks and network administration
en.certE14: E.14. Creation of web applications and databases and database administration
en.experienceAndSkills: Here's an overview of the technologies and tools I work with
en.infrastructureDesc: This is a demo DevOps project showcasing a complete infrastructure setup for a personal portfolio site. The project demonstrates modern CI/CD automation, containerization, cloud integration, and monitoring concepts using real tools and technologies. All code, patterns, and configurations are provided for educational and inspiration purposes.
en.infrastructureRepo: Explore the codebase and infrastructure patterns used in this demo project:
en.securityNoticeText: This repository is public for demonstration and inspiration purposes. It was created as an after-hours side-project to showcase infrastructure, tooling and CI/CD patterns for a personal portfolio. No real credentials, private keys, hostnames, ports or IP addresses are included. All credentials and secrets must be provided via GitHub Actions Secrets or environment variables â€” without them the resources will not be reachable or operational. DO NOT attempt to connect to any resources using information from this repository - it won't work.
en.gitopsDesc: GitOps is a modern approach to managing infrastructure and application deployments using Git as the single source of truth. All configuration and operational changes are made through pull requests and version control, enabling automated, auditable, and consistent delivery pipelines. This methodology combines the best practices of DevOps and Infrastructure as Code, making deployments safer, faster, and more transparent.
en.gitopsDemo: In my demo project, you can see GitOps in action with Kubernetes resources managed directly from a Git repository.
